title: Zenobiyl's Author Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
 _
**Name:** Zenobiyl

**Security Clearance:** Level 4

**Spatial Location:** Site 88

**Temporal Location:** 125 B.C.

**Designation(s):** Head of Temporal Research, MTF Phi-7 Field Agent, --Time Lord--

__**Biography:**__

Born 2003, raised in suburban American household. Discovered by Foundation after developing anomalous temporal abilities. Employed by MTF Phi-7 for containment of temporal anomalies. Promoted to Head of Temporal research at Site-88. Befriended a talking fly. Survived the Grandfather paradox. Studies time travel and all its elements. Lifelong bachelor.

__**Related Anomalies:**__

-[[[SCP-7097]]]: Gossip Fly
-[[[SCP-7907]]]: Langmeyer's Laugh Emporium
-[[[SCP-7535]]]: Tales of Gobliny
-[[[SCP-8220]]]: For Your Birthday

__**Additional Reports**__

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-drink-with-the-devil A Drink with the Devil]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/anomalous-anonymous Anomalous Anonymous]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/sins-of-the-mother Sins of the Mother]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/lazarus-syndrome Lazarus Syndrome]
